abstract: When a person sends me an e-mail with their contact info, what’s the easiest way to get it into Outlook’s Contacts automatically?
snippet: When a person sends me an e-mail with their contact info, what’s the easiest way to get it into Outlook’s Contacts automatically?
lead_paragraph: Q. I use Outlook. When a person sends me an e-mail with their name, phone number and address information at the bottom of the e-mail, what’s the easiest way to get all that information into Outlook’s Contacts automatically? It ought to be simple, but this is Microsoft.

abstract: What exactly happens when you “zap the PRAM” on a Macintosh computer?
snippet: What exactly happens when you “zap the PRAM” on a Macintosh computer?
lead_paragraph: Q. What exactly happens when you “zap the PRAM” on a Macintosh computer?

abstract: The new search options feature includes a couple of inventive ways to see your results.
snippet: The new search options feature includes a couple of inventive ways to see your results.
lead_paragraph: TIP OF THE WEEK Google’s new Search Options feature unveiled last week (snipurl.com/i1u5s) includes a couple of inventive ways to see your results. After you click the “Show options” link on the search results page, a link in the left column lets you see your hits as a Wonder Wheel  a graphic that shows the search term encircled by a set of links leading to related key words and phrases. Image and standard Web page results are also listed on the right side of the page. The left column on the Options page has a Timeline view as well, which tries to sort results based on chronological order.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Google’s New Search Options

abstract: The agreement would give some libraries a degree of oversight over the prices that Google could charge for its vast digital library.
snippet: The agreement would give some libraries a degree of oversight over the prices that Google could charge for its vast digital library.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  In a move that could blunt some of the criticism of Google for its settlement of a lawsuit over its book-scanning project, the company signed an agreement with the University of Michigan that would give some libraries a degree of oversight over the prices Google could charge for its vast digital library.

headline.main: Google Book-Scanning Pact to Give Libraries Input on Price
headline.print_headline: Google Book-Scanning Pact to Give Libraries Input on Price
